intro.welcome: At https://colibrrri.com, we use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, deliver personalized content, analyze traffic, and support our AI image generation services. This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and your choices regarding cookie management.
intro.scope: This policy should be read together with our Privacy Policy, which explains how we protect and use your personal information.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content:
Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet, or smartphone) by your web browser when you visit our website. They allow the website to recognize your device, remember your preferences, and improve functionality and performance.

Cookies may be session-based (deleted when you close your browser) or persistent (remain on your device for a set period).

howWeUseCookies.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.content:
We use the following types of cookies on СolibRRRi.com:

**a. Essential Cookies**
These cookies are necessary for core website functionality. They enable access to secure areas, load pages properly, and allow basic actions such as submitting forms. These cookies cannot be disabled.

**b. Performance and Analytics Cookies**
These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the website by collecting anonymized data. We use Google Analytics and similar tools to monitor page performance, identify usage trends, and optimize our AI platform.

**c. Functionality Cookies**
These cookies remember your preferences, such as language selection (English/Ukrainian) or recent AI tool usage, to personalize your experience and make your visit smoother.

**d. Advertising and Targeting Cookies**
We may use advertising platforms to deliver relevant advertisements. These cookies track your browsing behavior to show personalized ads, limit ad frequency, and measure ad campaign effectiveness.

thirdPartyCookies.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content:
Some cookies may be set by third-party services integrated into our platform. These include:

• **Google Analytics** - Website traffic and user behavior analysis
• **Google OAuth / Sign-in** - Social login functionality
• **Payment Processors** - Secure payment processing for subscriptions
• **CloudFlare** - Content delivery network and security

Third parties may use cookies in accordance with their own privacy policies. We encourage you to review their terms and settings for managing preferences.

managingCookies.title: 4. Your Cookie Choices
managingCookies.content:
You can control and manage your cookie preferences at any time. Most web browsers allow you to:

• View and delete cookies
• Block cookies from specific sites
• Block all cookies entirely

Please note that blocking or disabling cookies may impact the functionality of the site and restrict your access to certain features.

To manage cookies in popular browsers:
• **Google Chrome:** Settings > Privacy and Security > Cookies
• **Mozilla Firefox:** Options > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
• **Apple Safari:** Preferences > Privacy > Cookies and website data
• **Microsoft Edge:** Settings > Cookies and site permissions

updates.title: 5. Changes to This Cookie Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or regulatory requirements. All changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Effective Date."
